question_1.question: What should you ensure is online when executing ODX tasks for an ADF data source that requires it?
question_1.explanation: The Self-Hosted Integration Runtime must be online to encrypt the payload when executing ODX tasks for an ADF data source.

question_2.question: What error message might you receive if the Self-Hosted Integration Runtime is stopped after configuring a data source?

options.option_b: The Self-hosted Integration Runtime <Name> is offline
options.option_c: CloudException: Failed to encrypt sub-resource payload
options.option_d: ODX Synchronization or Transfer tasks failed

question_2.explanation: Stopping the Self-Hosted Integration Runtime after configuring a data source may result in an error message indicating that the Self-hosted Integration Runtime is offline.
